snippet.title: Elder's Will - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Elder's Will is an upcoming action-adventure 2D platformer about a father fueled by love and unwavering resolve determined to save his son.
After a devastating car crash, his son clings to life, and only a rare cure holds the key to his recovery. 

Try the Demo on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2733550?utm_source=YouTube
Stay Connected: https://rovln.crd.co/

Master innovative combat: Utilize your trusty crutches in a unique combat system, mastering devastating melee attacks and strategic ranged strikes to overcome cunning ninjas, fierce warriors, and monstrous foes encountered throughout your journey. Time your parries flawlessly, strategize your attacks, and emerge victorious from thrilling encounters.

Unleash your potential: As you progress, unlock powerful new abilities that enhance your movement and combat prowess. Utilize the grappling gun to soar across chasms and swing between platforms, and tap into your hidden reserves of strength for a powerful dash maneuver.

Explore vibrant landscapes, from Threshold Woods to Petroglyph Passages and Crimson Denouement, each teeming with unique challenges and captivating secrets.

Beyond the platforming: Uncover hidden secrets scattered throughout the world, adding depth and intrigue to your adventure. Each discovery unlocks achievements and rewards you with valuable insights into the world and its lore.

Elder's Will is coming to PC, Linux and macOS in 2024.
